title: Psalm 22
summary: Psalm 22 is the 22nd psalm of the Book of Psalms, beginning in English in the King James Version, "My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me?" The Book of Psalms is part of the third section of the Hebrew Bible, and a book of the Christian Old Testament. In the slightly different numbering system used in the Greek Septuagint and Latin Vulgate translations of the Bible, this psalm is Psalm 21. In Latin, it is known as "Deus, Deus meus".[1]
